Wordcloud

Function Keywords:

x::AbstractVector
y::AbstractVector

Wordcloud

words = ["mullet", "mull it", "julialang", "viz", "visualization", "muppet", "business", "front", "party", "back", "juliacon", "julia"]
frequencies = [80, 44, 40, 36, 32, 28, 24, 50, 12, 10, 10, 8]

wordcloud(x = words, y = frequencies)
